songs.title: Blue Horizons
songs.songLyric:
Endless blue above
Stretching to infinity
Where earth meets the sky

Clouds drift peacefully
White islands in azure seas
Heaven's symphony

Breath of gentle wind
Caressing the mountain peaks
Nature's lullaby

songs.title: Sky Dreams
songs.songLyric:
Close your eyes and see
The vastness of open skies
Dreams take flight so free

Soaring through the blue
Where limitations don't exist
Spirit breaks the chains

Infinite vistas
Unfold before searching eyes
Endless horizon

songs.title: Clouds Dance
songs.songLyric:
Fluffy white dancers
Twirling across azure stage
Ephemeral art

Shifting formations
Telling stories in the sky
Nature's poetry

Shadows cast below
Painting landscapes with darkness
Ever-changing world

songs.title: Heavenly Light
songs.songLyric:
Rays pierce through the clouds
Golden beams of warm sunlight
Celestial gift

Illuminating
The path through shadowed valleys
Guiding weary souls

Divine radiance
Spilling across the landscape
Heaven touches earth

songs.title: Aerial View
songs.songLyric:
Far below, the world
Spreads like a detailed map
Perspective transformed

Mountains turn to bumps
Rivers to silver ribbons
Cities to pixels

Elevated sight
Reveals our true dimension
Humble existence

songs.title: Dawn Chorus
songs.songLyric:
Morning symphony
Birds welcome the rising sun
Sky turns pink and gold

Dew-kissed grass glistens
As darkness retreats slowly
New day emerges

Hope rises with light
Promise of fresh beginnings
Sky heralds rebirth

songs.title: Sunset Serenade
songs.songLyric:
Day bids farewell now
Sun sinks into horizon
Painting skies aflame

Orange melts to red
Purple deepens into night
Stars begin to wake

Beauty in endings
Reminds us that all things pass
Yet return again

songs.title: Night Sky
songs.songLyric:
Darkness unfurls wide
Velvet canvas studded with
Diamonds of light

Ancient constellations
Tell stories of gods and myths
Timeless observers

Milky way stretches
Cosmic river flowing through
Infinite darkness
